Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 000122 ZMR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 51.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Map Changes, Staten Island (000122ZMR)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 920650(A ZMM), pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6 to allow the modification of a restrictive declaration D-143.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Application no. 20005281 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Nicolas, Inc., d/b/a Pitchoune, to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 226 Third Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Zoning resolution amendment application no. N 000519 ZRM, pursuant to §197-d and §200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4, to allow the location of unenclosed sidewalk cafes on Central Park South between Fifth and Sixth Avenues.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 20000066 ZMR, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 51.

Application no. 20005409 GFM, pursuant to §363 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning a proposed Authorizing Resolution authorizing the Department Of Transportation to grant a franchise for the provision of aerial tramway service over the East River between Manhattan and Roosevelt Island to the Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation.
